t.t-if: not o or not 'company_id' in o

div.span: This is a computer generated documents and no signature is required

li.p: These Standard Terms and Conditions of Sale (“Terms”) shall apply to Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd (“Seller”) Quotation,Acknowledgment or Invoice in which these Terms are specifically incorporated by reference (the Quotation, Acknowledgment, or Invoice together with these Terms, the “Agreement”). All purchases by Buyer of product and or services described in the Agreement (collectively, the “Product”) are expressly limited to and conditioned upon acceptance of these Terms, regardless of whether Buyer purchases such Product through any media or means,including but limited to, verbal or written purchase orders, electronic orders, acknowledgments, confirmations, or other writings from Buyer to Seller.

Unless such provisions are expressly agreed to by Seller in a writing signed by Seller, any additional or conflicting terms and conditions contained on,attached to or referenced in Buyer’s writings, or other prior or later communication from Buyer to Seller, shall have no effect on the purchase of any such Product by Buyer from Seller and are expressly rejected by Seller.

These Terms along with the Quotation, Acknowledgment or Invoice in which they are incorporated by reference are deemed an offer for sale by Seller.If Buyer does not accept in writing Seller’s offer to sell, Buyer’s commencement of performance (including ordering, purchases or taking delivery of or accepting Product) shall, in all cases, constitute Buyer’s unqualified and unconditional acceptance of the Agreement. Any conduct by Buyer which recognizes the existence of a contract pertaining to the subject matter hereof shall constitute acceptance by Buyer of this Agreement and all of its Terms.Additional or different terms provided in Buyer’s purchase order or any other documentation from Buyer which vary in any degree from any of the Terms here in are hereby objected to and rejected.

These Terms may be modified from time to time by Seller, by notice to Buyer. Each such modification shall be binding upon Buyer with respect to all purchases occurring after the date of such modification. Except as otherwise described herein, no modification or termination hereof or waiver of any of the obligations hereunder shall be effective unless in writing and signed by the party against whom such modification, termination or waiver is sought to be enforced.

ol.li: Buyer covenants that it will hold in trust and confidence any and all information of a confidential nature regarding Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd’s business or affairs, including, without limitation data provided by Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd regarding the design of the Products, and will not divulge, disclose, or in any way distribute to anyone, except to employees with a need to make use of such proprietary information.

Buyer shall protect such proprietary information from disclosure to others with the same degree of care that a reasonable, diligent and prudent person would exercise in protecting its own confidential information of like sensitivity.

The foregoing obligation shall not be applicable if Buyer can demonstrate by an appropriate document that such information:
was already or later became, through no fault of Buyer, generally available to the public
was already known to Buyer prior to the disclosure thereof by Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd
Or has lawfully become known to Buyer through a third party.
All quotations are valid for 30 days, unless specified.
Once a quote has passed the expiry date, Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd may cancel the quote without having to notify or receive an approval from customer.
All goods supplied by us shall be in accordance with the quotation given and any further specifications or descriptions agreed or expressly listed or set out on the face of the order.
We must be informed in writing within 30 days of acceptance of the quotation of any changes, alterations, or reductions.

If Buyer requests changes in specifications or designs relating to any Product to be provided hereunder, shipment schedules shall be revised,if necessary, and an equitable adjustment, upward or downward, shall be made in price.
The price in the final quotation may vary from the original price if there are any price or product changes requested by customers.
We endeavor to honor every prices quoted, if there is a price increase that is beyond our control, we reserve the right to increase the price as necessary.

li.strong: SHIPMENT FEES, GST, VAT AND TAXES:

ol.li: Prices listed are exclusive of all transportation, insurance, license fees, customs duties, VAT, GST or any other duties or taxes which may be chargeable in connection with the supply of the products to Buyer, unless other specific terms are shown on the quotation.

Any such tax, fee, or charge of any nature whatsoever designated, levied, based or imposed by any governmental authority on, or measured by, the transaction between Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd and Buyer shall be paid by Buyer in addition to the prices quoted or invoiced.

In the event Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd pays any such tax, fee, or charge, at the time of sale or thereafter, Buyer shall promptly reimburse Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd.

This quotation is complete as written, and no changes, amendment or modification shall be made to this quotation without a separate written quotation from Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd.

On acceptance of the quotation by placing an order within the specified period as of the quotation, you will be bound by these terms and conditions stated. Each quotation accepted shall constitute an individual legally binding contract between you and us. Such contract is hereinafter referred to in these terms and conditions as "an order".
Please ensure that our quotation number and the description on the quote to be the same as the one on the PO to avoid any misunderstanding of parts required.

Buyer acknowledges that any Product being purchased hereunder is being manufactured especially for Buyer. In no event shall Buyer have the right to cancel, modify or delay any order, except with Seller’s written consent and subject to conditions then to be agreed upon, which shall include protection of Seller against all losses.
We reserve the right to retain any deposits or charge in full for any cancellation of PO, depending on the duration of cancellation made after PO was issued.

Cancellation of an order for the convenience of the customer will result in the following charges:
Milestone Charge
Receipt of order prior to start of engineering 0%
Completion of engineering 25%
Completion of procurement 50%
Completion of sub-assemblies 75%
Completion of manufacturing 100%

Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd will try to ensure compliance with any delivery times and dates given, but such times and dates are an estimate only. We will not be responsible for any loss whatsoever arising from or consequential upon delay in delivery.

Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd have the right to make partial shipments, and each partial shipment shall be deemed a separate sale, and payment shall become due therefore in accordance with the terms of payment as of the quotation, unless otherwise specified.

Unless this Agreement expressly provides otherwise, the Terms used in this Agreement shall have the meanings set forth in INCOTERMS 2010, as published and promulgated by the International Chamber of Commerce.

Notwithstanding any shipping term, title to any Product sold and risk of loss of such Product passes to Buyer upon delivery by Seller to the carrier and Product shall be deemed “delivered” at such time, and any claims for losses or damage occurring after delivery to carrier by Seller shall be made by Buyer directly with the carrier.

If payment hereunder is not made on time, Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd, in addition to all other legal, equitable and contract rights, shall be entitled to interest on such overdue payment at the rate of 2% (two percent) per month.
Notwithstanding the foregoing, interest shall not be charged on any overdue payment at a rate in excess of the maximum rate permitted by law.

Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd warrants that the Product will conform, at the time of delivery to Buyer, to the Agreement specifications specified in the quotation, order acknowledgment, or invoice.

In the case of Product bought from Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd unable to conform, Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd will offer repair or exchange, solely if the cause of disability is due to manufacturing reasons.

If any form of repair or consultation from Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd is required, the service will be chargeable and cost has to be agreed before any form of repair or consultation takes place.

Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd and Buyer expressly agree that the product excludes any form of arranty, guarantees, or representations, expressed or implied, of compatibility for a particular purpose or use.

If Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd determines, while analyzing your product, that repairs are needed due to failures of parts that are neither supplied nor repaired by Semiconductor Technologies Singapore or are needed due to damage caused by misuse or misapplication, Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd reserves the right to return the product to you without repairing it, and will hold you responsible for the diagnostic fee, shipment charges, plus any applicable tax and also all other charges that are involved in the process.
Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd may hold you responsible for the diagnostic fee, shipment charges, plus any applicable tax,and all other charges involved in the process if Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd performs an analysis on your product,provides a quotation to you, and you do not authorize Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd to undertake the repairs for the quoted charges.
Unless your product is repaired under warranty, you will be required to pay Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd.

Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd will issue a quotation for the repair cost. Sending out the equipment to Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd for repair denotes the quoted pricing for repair is agreeable.
Your payment is due when the product is returned to you unless specified otherwise.
The quoted amount will be an estimate and will be liable to changes. It includes all parts, labor, and shipment required for the repair of the product plus any applicable tax.

In the event the services of a Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd required to provide field work or assistance to include, but not be limited to, installation, supervision, training of personnel, etc., following conditions applies:
Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd shall furnish technical and professional services as may be required including labor,transportation, and supervision and shall perform all operations necessary and required to satisfactorily provide technical assistance and direction to the customer during the installation, start-up, and/or training of Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd furnished equipment, as may be requested.
Materials, supplies and equipment may either be supplied by Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd or buyer, to be determined at such time that a contract for field service work is initiated.
Upon Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd completion of work at the site, Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd shall submit a trip report, documenting dates at the site, people contacted, activities, problems observed, and inspection performed by field personnel.
Field Service Orders require customers to FAX a Purchase Order to Semiconductor Technologies Singapore Pte Ltd prior to the departure of the Service Engineer to the jobsite. Work performed due to defective material or workmanship within limitations of the standard warranty will be performed at no charge, subject to the inspection of products.

data.template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
                
                    

                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            		        
                       function subst() {
                           var vars = {};
                           var x = document.location.search.substring(1).split('&');
                           for (var i in x) {
                               var z = x[i].split('=', 2);
                               vars[z[0]] = unescape(z[1]);
                           }
                           var x=['frompage', 'topage', 'page', 'webpage', 'section', 'subsection', 'subsubsection'];
                           for (var i in x) {
                               var y = document.getElementsByClassName(x[i]);
                               for (var j=0; j<y.length; ++j)
                                   y[j].textContent = vars[x[i]];
                           }
                           var operations = {
    							'last-page': function (elt) { elt.style.visibility = (vars.page === vars.topage) ? "visible" : "hidden"; },
							};

                           for (var klass in operations) {
                               var y = document.getElementsByClassName(klass);
                               for (var j=0; j<y.length; ++j)
                               operations[klass](y[j]);
                           }
                      }
